title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 248: Featuring Auston Matthews
description:
On Thursday’s episode of Spittin’ Chiclets the guys are joined by Auston Matthews. The Maple Leafs star forward joins (44:40) the podcast to discuss how this season is going, his friendship with Justin Bieber, his new house and more. The boys also talk about their crazy past few days including running into Brendan Shanahan at the airport and some big interviews. The guys wrap up talking Lucic, pregame meals, and Golden Knights.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
